content: this unisex dribble bib is ideal for little ones while they re teething approx 5 months+ trendy yet timeless and super quick to make wheya has rave reviews from beginner crocheters so although we use a medley of stitches and techniques it is definitely a master-able project the pattern includes comprehensive instructions detailed step by step pictures and full video support as well they re seriously quick to make and new parents will love to have a stash of cotton bibs ready come teething time with multiple strap options you can make one of each or choose your favourite ᐧ instant download pdf ᐧ clear + comprehensive pattern ᐧ available in us or uk standard terms ᐧ photo guide + video support you can sell your finished item with pattern credit © sarling studio 2022 www sarling com @sarling studio
